New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [330pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [330pts]

    • Other [300pts]

      • Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [300pts]

        Selections: 3 Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [300pts]

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, WIZARD, EVOCATORS, CORPUSCANT, DRACOLINE, Other

        Magic: Evocators, Spell: Empower, Unit: Evocators, Unit Abilities: Celestial Lightning Arc, Evocator-Prime, Evocators, Mount, Supernatural Roar, Thunderous Pounce, Weapon: Tempest Blade and Stormstave


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Evocators 1/1Empower
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Empower 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly REDEEMER or SACROSANCT unit wholly within 12" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Evocators 12"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Celestial Lightning Arc You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks made with missile weapons that target this unit. In addition, each time this unit attacks, after all of its attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. If you do so, roll 2 dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Evocator-Prime The leader of this unit is an Evocator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Evocator-Prime’s melee weapons.
        Evocators A unit of Evocators is a WIZARD while it has 2 or more models. It cannot attempt to cast any spells other than Empower, but any number of units of EVOCATORS can attempt to cast Empower in the same hero phase.
        Mount This unit’s Celestial Dracolines attack with their Monstrous Claws.
        Supernatural Roar Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units when they are within 3" of one or more friendly DRACOLINES.
        Thunderous Pounce You can re-roll charge rolls for this model. In addition, the Damage characteristic for this model's Monstrous Claws is D3 instead of 1 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Tempest Blade and Stormstave Melee1"43+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Anvils of the Heldenhammer

          Battle Trait: No True Death, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Heroes of Another Age


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        No True Death You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER units.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Heroes of Another Age You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER unit wholly within 9" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO that is a general. That unit can attack with all of the missile weapons it is armed with, or make a pile-in move and attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, Errata July 2018

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Astral Templars

          Battle Trait: Beast Stalkers, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Cut off the Head


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Beast Stalkers Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by ASTRAL TEMPLARS units that target a MONSTER.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Cut off the Head You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick an ASTRAL TEMPLARS unit that is wholly within 9" of a friendly ASTRAL TEMPLARS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ASTRAL TEMPLARS HERO that is a general. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by that unit that target a HERO.

          Battle Trait: Driven by Vengeance, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Righteous Hatred


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Driven by Vengeance You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS units if they made a charge move in the same turn.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield.         Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Righteous Hatred You can use this command ability the start of the combat phase. If you do so, you pick a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS unit wholly within 9" of a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly CELESTIAL VINDICATORS HERO that is a general. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the end of that phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, Errata July 2018

          Selections: Celestial Warbringers

          Battle Trait: Fearless Foresight, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Astral Conjunction


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Fearless Foresight At the start of the first battle round, after determining who has the first turn but before the first turn begins, you can pick up to D3 friendly CELESTIAL WARBRINGERS units and set them up again (any restrictions in the set-up instructions for the battleplan being used still apply).
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Astral Conjunction You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly CELESTIAL WARBRINGERS WIZARD wholly within 9" of a friendly CELESTIAL WARBRINGERS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly CELESTIAL WARBRINGERS HERO that is a general. Add 1 to casting rolls for that unit until the end of that phase.

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Hallowed Knights

          Battle Trait: Only the Faithful, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Holy Crusaders


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Only the Faithful If a friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS unit is affected by a spell or endless spell, roll a dice. On a 6+ ignore the effects of that spell on that unit.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Holy Crusaders You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS unit wholly within 9" of a friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS HERO that is a general. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, that unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Hammers of Sigmar

          Battle Trait: First to be Forged, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Soul of the Stormhost


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        First to be Forged Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR units.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units.         Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Soul of the Stormhost You can use this command ability when a friendly HAMMERS OF SIGMAR REDEEMER unit is destroyed. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 5+ a new unit identical to the one that was destroyed is added to your army. Set up the new unit anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy models. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, Errata July 2018

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Knights Excelsior

          Battle Trait: Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Storm of Annihilation, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: No Mercy


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Shock and Awe Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that were set up on the battlefield during the same turn.
        Storm of Annihilation If a friendly KNIGHTS EXCELSIOR unit makes an attack that destroys an enemy unit, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by that KNIGHTS EXCELSIOR unit for the rest of the battle.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        No Mercy You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly KNIGHTS EXCELSIOR unit wholly within 9" of a friendly KNIGHTS EXCELSIOR HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly KNIGHTS EXCELSIOR HERO that is a general. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit until the end of the turn.

          Selections: Tempest Lords

          Battle Trait: Grand Strategists, Scions of the Storm, Shock and Awe, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Rousing Oratory


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Grand Strategists At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+ you receive 1 extra command point.
        Scions of the Storm Instead of setting up a STORMCAST ETERNAL unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up in the Celestial Realm as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the Celestial Realm for each unit you have set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units in the Celestial Realm on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units in the Celestial Realm that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.

If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Rousing Oratory You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly TEMPEST LORDS unit wholly within 9" of a friendly TEMPEST LORDS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly TEMPEST LORDS HERO that is a general. You can reroll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [30pts]

      • Endless Spell: Prismatic Palisade [30pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, HYSH, PRISMATIC PALISADE, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Prismatic Palisade, Unit Abilities: Blinding Light, Dazzling Brilliance, Empowered by Hysh


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Prismatic Palisade 5If successfully cast, set up a Prismatic Palisade model wholly within 18" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blinding Light At the start of each turn, roll a dice for each unit within 6" of this model. On a 5+ subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of the turn.
        Dazzling Brilliance A model cannot see another model if an imaginary straight line, 1mm wide, drawn from the centre of its base to the centre of the other model’s base passes over this model.
        Empowered by Hysh If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Light, add 1 to rolls made to determine if a unit is affected by this model’s Blinding Light ability.
